Desc.entry: A registered charity and not for profit organisation which provides training in new information technology, business administration training, book-keeping, teaching qualifications, English and maths, for those out of work in the Manor area (enrolments in January, April and September). Has a Community Resource Unit providing clerical support to the whole of the Manor and Castle areas. Resources include creche, computers, photocopiers, and meeting rooms. Offers a CV compilation service and help with job applications and interview techniques.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9.30am-4.30pm, Fri 9.30am-2.30pm (office hours); One Fri in the month (Management Committee), please contact for times of courses

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
